overview: The "brother film" of Legokaupunki, made by Jary and Jiri KuukkanenÂ´and a few friends between 1977-1980, published by Heimo Kuukkanen. This animation, created not long after the introduction of the LEGO minifigure in 1978, feature the earliest known use of a minifig walk cycle.
title: LEGO Animaatiot77 80
